content.detailedDescription:
Reported to asd by phone: 

i was at hy-vee putting groceries in the car when i noticed a group of stars in the eastern sky at approximately 75 degrees, and mentioned to my teenage daughter that there was something odd about them. we got in the car and i looked at the stars for a couple of minutes. i watch the skies a lot and it just did not look normal. then, as we were looking at the "stars" a group of about 12-15 of them started moving around the sky in different patterns in all directions. i said "do you see that?" to my daughter, just to be sure i was not seeing things, and she replied that she did. we watched as the objects, which we now realized were not stars or planets, moved around very quickly, shooting across some distance at a high rate of speed - faster than any jet, then back again to the group. they were all independently moving around up, down, left, right, etc., then after a few minutes the objects suddenly went back to their original positions and stopped, once again looking like stars. anyone who did not know the sky would not have noticed the "extra" stars in the sky. we kept looking for a while but they did not move again, so we left for home. this was the craziest thing i've seen in my life, and now i know for sure that we are not alone in the universe. please let me know if anyone else saw this.
content.summary: Group of starlike objects started moving all around the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my dad was heading home from the dollar store. heading east 9:30 pm cst when i noticed what appeared like a star like triangle formation which i didnt give much thought to. but as i looked to my right i seen several more star like triangle in shape what i thought to be star clusters. i then pointed them out to my dad who at that time was focused on driving. seeing he dont see very well at night. hes 71 and im 46yrs old. when i pointed the few you could see in the eastern sky which was the direction we was traveling he said i wonder what it was we was seeing so right before we made are turn he pulled over so we could take a better look at what we was seeing. as i climbed out of the van we was in i noticed that there was more alot more.They was north soth east and west of my location and over head as well.I never took the time to count them all and to this day we still dont know what them triangle objects was im not saying they were ufos we was seeing for we havent believed in what wewe thought was just plain stupid and to this day we remain skeptical but we cant denie what we seen that night all i can say its something that me and my dad seen that night and something personally hope i never see again.
content.summary: Triangle formation star like 30+ observed stationary plusating some red blue white

content.detailedDescription: Was driving to work at 8 25 pm on 1-28-2014 when to the right of me noticed a green ball of fire that went lateral for just a couple of seconds then went straight down the light appeared to have diminished upon descent
content.summary: Green ball of fire that descened quickly

content.detailedDescription:
i have been taking pictures of sunrises & sunsets for the past year or so & an occasional partly cloudy sky if the cloud formations & the sun shining on them, catches my eye. i use my cell phone camera which has produced some beautiful scenic images. this day was the day before thanksgiving and it was a partly sunny day & quite warm the clouds were stunning and as usual i will pull off the road and snap a few shots for fun. it was only after i took the pictures that i noticed these weird shiny orbs in all three of the pictures i took that day. so i enlarged them
several times & also put them through a picture app on my phone to use a grayscale effect. now, here's the reason why i did that. 2 of the 3 pictures have what appear to be possibly semi translucent or barely noticeable straight beams or lines that seem to come out of some of these orbs but some were in shape of triangles. it almost looked like a cloaked craft of sort, basically invisible except for the triangle lines that formed. since then, i have noticed more and more unusual objects in various photos i have taken. please note, i did not see any of this with the naked eye. i probably would have fainted. my camera seems to see amazing things tho, as i said, discovering i have quite a few interesting things in my photos besides beautiful skyscapes.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the sky around noon on the day before thanksgiving. it was partly sunny/partly cloudy and the colors of the clouds & shapes inspired me to take a few pics with my cell phone. it saw these objects in the pictures afterwards.

content.detailedDescription: We were at home, leaning out of our back room window late at night smoking a cigarette when we saw a visibly solid object disc shape descend slowly from the nw and stop - the object became stationary.  all the while we observed pulsating red orange yellow redish lights that were visible around the perimeter of the object - the lights pulsated as if in a cycle.  after  several seconds of what appeared to show the object to be in a stationary position - we could tell it was stationary because the object held its outline against the tops of the trees without moving.  the event occurred  a short distance from our home which we observed directly across a field adjoining our property.  as the object began to slowly move again, it appeared to dip slightly and very slowly descended behind the trees and it was then no longer visible.  within a few seconds of the object disappearing behind the tree line we saw a helicopter (we think it was) since we often see helicopters flying over the area at night and are able to recognize these, flying quickly in the direction of the object.  the helicopter had normal red flash lights.  this too disappeared behind the tree line.  the object was so large we assume that there must be other reports since this is somewhat of an urban rural area and it just could not have been missed since it was so apparently clear in the sky.  we were both amazed at this object and somewhat shocked to see this.  my husband ran to our kitchen to get his iphone in order to get a picture but the object did the slight dip and descended behind the tree line before we could pull up the camera app.  this one was the most clear and strangest object we have seen ever.  i hope someone else saw this too and reported it because it was amazing and somewhat awesome to see. we can't imagine that no one else would not have seen this.
content.summary: Large disc like object with visible outline pulsating red orange yellow redish lights around visible perimeter  slow descent from nw hovered above tree line stationary then slightly dipped  object moved very very slowly we could see a solid visible disc.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to watch new year fireworks and caught this video on my ipad. have seen basically the same thing on another occasion in front of home with the 2 orbs? coming from the north to south pattern one right after the other about 30seconds apart. same flight pattern , stalling in flight and then went up out of sight.
content.summary: Went outside to watch new year fireworks and caught this on my ipad  actually 3 sighting of these orbs?

content.detailedDescription: Hanging with coworkers after work at our camp, when a friend told us to come see the ufo outside. it had two very bright white lights on what seemed (because of directional movement) to be the front and one green on the rear. it seemed to cover the distance from millet to dilley in a fraction of a second and back numerous times all the while changing altitude drastically in an almost spiral, "fishtail" motion, then hovering numerous times before disappearing behind the cemetery treeline. all of which was done silently. a few times for a span of about a second when it seemed to be at the nearest point of its spiral the white lights that i'm assuming were in the front brightened tremendously. curiously the lights didn't seem to project any light but... i don't even know how to explain their characteristics further actually...Took video with my phone for about thirty seconds before quitting due to its not giving justice.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Observed object with two bright white and one green constant lights moving very abnormally, hovering,, and covering large distances very quickly and silently for about 5mins.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my normal routine route to work at 5:30 a.M. pst on soledad canyon rd in canyon country, ca. i was driving and all of a sudden noticed a disturbance in the sky that caught my attention.  while driving, i noticed a large set of lights approaching me from a great distance.  at first, i assumed it was a group of helicopters.  when i took a more derivative look, i noticed that it the object was moving faster than helicopters or plans.  thereafter, it was in my left view.  afterwards, it maneuvered to my front view where i originally observed the flying object.  then, it preceded to come in my direction of travel.  as a took another glance, the object was lower than it's original marking in the sky.  shortly after, it went right past my vehicle and i was able to view it clear as day.  the vehicles in front of me dropped drastically lower than the speed limit causing me to almost collide in an accident.  i had no drastic feelings towards the object at the time, but i was in shock.  the object preceded to my left at a quick speed and hovered over golden valley, ca. as i continued down soledad canyon rd, santa clarita, ca, i realized it was still hovering over the above mentioned location.   i continued on my route to work and lost site of the flying object.   after i lost site of the flying craft, i routinely go to the mcdonalds on soledad canyon rd, santa clarita, ca; i asked the cashier if he saw anything abnormal, and he advised he witnessed the same object for approximately 1 minute.
content.summary: I thought i was looking at multiple apache helicopters flying extremely close to each other, because the distance and all of the flashing lights of the object.

content.detailedDescription: I had gotten off work shortly after 2am, two of my friends were waiting for me. i got into the front passenger seat of my friends car while the other sat in the back. we went to the gas station and then grabbed a quick bite to eat. upon returning to my place of employment where my car was parked, we parked facing west across 3 spots rather than pulling into one spot, parallel to the curb. my friend and i in the front seat were looking ahead at the horizon while my other buddy in the back seat was on his phone. suddenly, a giant green disc with a green/white tail appeared in view flying from northeast to southwest came into view. it looked like it was on fire, but instead of orange it was green. i'd say it was about 70ft in diameter flying about 400 feet above the ground, with the tail trailing another hundred feet or so. the object was travelling at a high speed, must have been hundreds of miles an hour since it disappeared from our view in no more than 4 seconds. my friend and i in the front seat let out a few "holy s***s" "wtfs" "oh my gods" and "what is that" during and after. our friend in the back unfortunately missed the short-lived event. we then went driving in the direction it went for about 20 minutes looking for evidence of a crash or landing but found nothing.
content.summary: Bright green disc with green/white trail

content.detailedDescription: Was taking my son to rotc color guard practice around 5:30pm and as we were heading south over the rail tracks to his high school we both noticed a very prominent circle shaped cloud to the southwest of our location. it was weird because it was slightly below the cloud layer and it looked liked something had shot up from it and caused a change in the cloud layer above. in my 49 years i had never seen this type of cloud before so i just wanted to report it and upload some pictures. i dropped my son off and then took a couple of pictures. i then decided to drive a few miles south to the ak-chin casino area as it appeared to be right over their location by then. i drove there and took a few more pictures. you have to enlarge the pictures to see it better but it is there.
content.summary: Large circle cloud ring over casino area

content.detailedDescription: I was going to my brother's house and had just exited my car and started walking on the sidewalk toward his house.  i felt like there was something above me so i looked up and saw a light colored v-shaped object.  i kept watching, wondering what it could be.  i froze in my tracks, watched it glide silently over my head, turn smoothly and glide over an railroad track overpass and disappear behind the clouds.  i didn't make a noise, i didn't want to disturb it because it was so odd that i just wanted to watch it and see what it did!
content.summary: Boomerang shaped white object glided silently above my head and disappeared beyond clouds.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Heading home from mcdonalds in the backseat of my dad's car, i was looking at my cell phone, and i saw something bright enter my peripheral vision, looked up and saw a red light up high in the atmosphere, mind you the weather was clear, a bit cloudy and sunny. i mistook it for venus at first and was about to tell my parents but thought that its weird that it is out at this time and then another red orb/light appears. i kind of just sat there with my jaw dropping at the sudden appearance of another light, and just as quickly as they came, they disappeared or blinked/faded out (sort of sucked inwards) and i immediately told my parents who seemed skeptical and did not witness what happened. i sort of felt sick after but that is possibly because of the cold weather we have been having recently.
content.summary: Approx 10-20 seconds,  one red ufo appears in the sky, mistaken for a planet until the other shows up.

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing with my dad when we thought we saw a saw a big star then it was to close to be a star it looked like a big orange ball flying across the night sky in a strait line. it dissapered
content.summary: Big orange ball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Walked out side of house as storm winds blew chairs off front porch. i noticed a red light behind a tree and thought it to be an airplane navigation light. i waited to see what direction it was heading but it didn't move except to get larger. before long i could se two lights on each side of the red one. then two more white lights and then two more all in line with each other. i tried to see how far away it was but could not determine. i went back inside and got my binoculars. i got the object in focus but still could not tell how far away it was. at this point all the white lights seemed to merge and stuff that looked like molten metal seemed to drip from it. at that point i stuck my head in the door and told my wife to come out and look at it. i looked back at it and i could make out the shape from background light in the sky and then several of the light zoomed off in different directions. they were round white lights that just disappeared into the night sky. the dripping stopped and the white lights re-aligned. the shape was rectangular but thicker in the middle and the ends seemed squared off. i had thought they may have been some one's christmas lights blowing in the wind, when it started doing the dripping thing again from its bottom edge. my wife went in after seeing that last part, and i told her i was going to take the car and see if i could find  where it was. it was still in place when i got in the car and headed north to try and find it. this area is hilly in town and after going up and down the east-west streets to try and locate the object, i could not find it. returning home it was no longer to be seen. yesterday in the daylight i checked to see if there could have been any other explanation for this sighting and could not. they were not there last night so today i decided to contact you to see if anyone else had seen this or anything like it before.
content.summary: Noticed red light behind tress, and thought it to be aircraft navigation lights. with strong winds blowing it didn't move and formed a string of eight white lights on either side of red center light.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready for bed when i noticed a bright object from my bedroom window to the sw. i got my binoculars and observed that it was flashing bright colors - white, red, and blue every 1/2 second. through the binoculars i could see that there was a dull grey spherical object with lights spinning around it from right to left. i went outside to the street in order to observe the object better and noticed that there was a second similar object to my right (west). the object to my right then disappeared after a few minutes while the one to my left remained in the same position. i had to go in to bed and did not see the second object return but the first object remained. later that night at about 4:30 a.M. i was awakened by a bright light coming into my bedroom window. i was confused as to what could have caused that as it has never happened before and i could find no cause for it the next morning. the strange thing was that i went right back to sleep without investigating the light at the time. i don't know if that was related to the lights in the sky or not.  the next two nights i looked for the objects again but they did not reappear. i looked online to see where the planets were and there should have been none in that area but this did not look like a planet at all, and planets do not flash in exact timing or have spinning lights. i wanted to report this but must remain anonymous due to my job.
content.summary: Two bright objects in sky with multiple colors flashing sequentially

content.detailedDescription: I am the assistant state director for missouri mufon and had my own sighting last night. my husband and i were leaving bass pro shops in independence, missouri near 291 and 40 highway when something caught my attention in the northwest sky at approximately 40 degrees from the horizon. i watched a very large flaming glowing orange fireball cross the sky from the northwest to the southwest in a straight-line path for six to eight seconds. it was perpendicular to the ground and never changed course. the object left no trail whatsoever and appeared to come to an abrupt stop, then fade out like a light bulb in less than two seconds. i did not hear a sound but did feel a strange vibration. there was nothing else in the vicinity (planes or helicopters) and the sky was clear. the object looked like a complete sphere that was made out of orange flames. the size was almost the size of a walnut held at arm's length. it appeared to be about 500-1,000 feet away from me but it is impossible to tell distance. unfortunately, my husband did not see it as he was getting into the vehicle at the time and i did not have time to get my phone out to take a photo.
content.summary: Huge flaming orange fireball shot across sky - with no trail

content.detailedDescription: I was eating dinner last night when i seen a black helicopter like ufo with exterior light. it stopped above a house and emitted a light and a body was taken. then it disappeared really fast.
content.summary: Black helicopter like ufo seen

content.detailedDescription:
I was at walmart on 39st in independence i looked up and saw a rainbow like
cloud so i took a picture of it.Got home and looked at it and this big pin
ball looking was falling out of the sky but i don't think it landed i took
two pictures and it looked like three of them was in the cloud.
content.summary: It looked like a pin ball

content.detailedDescription: My sons and i just arrived from my youngest  base ball game, when we were getting out of the truck we all seen it  and the boys were asking me what is that and i said i don't knows. i then sent my oldest son to go get the camera i tried to snap a couple pictures but i don't have the steadiest of hands so i gave the camera back to my oldest,son and he snapped a few photos and  of all the photos we got one good one. we watched it for about 15 min  then it just vanished we didn't see it shoot off in any direction i it just vanished.
content.summary: Donut shaped

content.detailedDescription:
While staying at the orlando world center marriott resort in orlando i stepped onto the back porch to make a panoramic photo of the sunrise.  while taking a series of 3 photos i noticed a curving brighter line in the clouds.  i assumed it was part of a contrail and paid no further attention until it came time to process the 3 photos into a panorama a day or two later.

after loading the 3 digital olympus raw file images into my computer and into photoshop the bright curve caught my attention again.  when i blew the image up to 1:1 pixel view i was astounded to see that my "contrail" was actually a sharply defined disc resting in the clouds about 15-20 degrees above the horizon.  the disc was tilted toward me, the top partially obscured by the clouds but the bright edge of the disc very clearly visible.

the image was taken with an olympus om-d e-m5 using an olympus 14-150mm lens at 14mm.  the e-m5 is a micro 4/3 camera and the short side of the image at 14mm covers approx 45 degrees.  by laying a grid over the image i was able to determine that the diameter of the disc was covering approximately 2 degrees.  guesstimating that the object might be as much as 5-10 miles away i concluded that the size of the disc might be about 850-1700 feet.

the image of the disc appears on two of the three overlapping images i made for the pano.  there are only a few seconds elapsed between the two images and the disc shows no apparent motion.

i am attaching the jpeg image of the pano i created along with a 1:1 pixel crop of the area showing the disc which is located at the lower left of the pano.  the raw files of the original are available on request.

note that the timestamps in the exif data are 1 hour ahead of actual time as i forgot to adjust the camera for end of daylight savings in the fall.
content.summary: Very large, sharply defined flat disc resting in clouds perhaps 5 or more miles away

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from a appt. in concord n.H. i had gotton a ride for a women that worked with the c.A.P. office in somersworth n.H./she had business with the state office of some kind. i remember her licsense plate read hounds on it but i dont remember her name. we had just left the lee traffic circle heading east passed durham nh / to get me home when we saw the craft. i new right away that it was something id never seen before it was very large and had lights that seemed to revolve/rotate on the underside but the upper part of the craft seemed to be sationary only the underside of the craft was moving /the lights as i recall were red and possibly green or blue .It was in and open area of durham n.H with the the unh horse barns just behind it and the rt#4 which we were traveling i dont really remember for sure but one of the lights were defintitly red. as i looked a the craft it occurred to me that the lights were moving with the bottom half and appeared to be switching from  one side to the other side of the ufo  but i realized that they were just rotating on the under side . this craft was very large and it looked like a feeris wheel on its side ,it made no autable sound other than a low electrial sort of hum and current you could feel on you skin and it kind of reminded me of the sound a jump rope makes when it breaks the air around it as you are jumping that low whooping sound but not really a sound maybe a vibration. when i got home i called the dover pd and they laught at me, so i called the pease air force base i  portsmouth n.H. they told me that it was probably a helicopter. i also called the durham police station and when they took my call they( the dispatcher)  didnt want to talk becauce they(other officer/police employees)  were witnessing the ufo themselves and she wanted  to get off the phone and see the ufo for herselves.  at the time this occurred i didnt have a phone in my apt. i had to use my neigbors phone. they were a husband /wife and child that lived right next to me .  the husband was in the air force and worked at pease air base   after i made the calls from his phone he was call back to the base for some purpose unknown to me at the time and that he would not discuss with me because i asked him if it had any thing to do with what i saw . he would not give me an answer and left to report for work. but it seemes very odd to me. i still wonder about this and would love to talk with other who might have seen the same thing.
content.summary: I saw a ufo on route #4 in the early evening of march 5 1978 over the road on rt/4 and the unh horse barn on that evening .  went home and call local police and the pease air forcebase about my sighting

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving along i-20 west toward atlanta, ga. at approximately 6:31pm, i witnessed what appeared to be 3 bright red balls of light in the western horizon. i thought it was odd, as the sky was overcast(no stars) and they seemed to be pulsing in and out. they moved across the sky from left to right, and right to left, in varying speeds. after about 10 minutes, 2 more appeared from the nw sky, and moved to join the other 3. the event occurred for the next 22 minutes, before i saw what looked like a helicopter approach from the north(i could see it's spot light). it must have spooked whatever they were, because when it approached, they vanished all of a sudden. over the next 10 minutes, 3 more helicopters appeared in the area. they flew around in circles with their spot lights shining around. i only lost sight of them because i merged onto another hwy, and couldn't see them anymore.
content.summary: 5 bright red balls of light in western sky over atlanta.

content.detailedDescription: Obvserved white, segmented object sitting on cliff.
content.summary: White segmented object on ground.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my dad seen a ufo it was over the horizon it was just sitting there in the sky in raleigh nc and my dad thought it was a pole and we got closer and it wasn't a pole there is no way it was a pole a pole cant be that high in the air and it wasn't even blinking lights so i no it wasn't a plane it looked like it was white colored and then when we get in hillsborough i see it again and i tell my dad to stop and i get out and try to take a video of it but my tablet wouldn't take it
content.summary: Omg

content.detailedDescription: Like i said in the short description, zoom in that was not birds
content.summary: Black objects moving at least 600 mph from right to left diagonally

content.detailedDescription:
7pm 1/26/14 stepped out onto back porch, eye caught movement to the s. saw for the second time a....Ufo? bright yellow/red/orange in color. traveled towards our house north bound, stopped, changed direction e. i had called my family to witness the object, its all on camera! object stopped, flashed very brightly several times and then discarded something??? glowing discharge from bottom of object. object lost brightness intensity and then slowly went away?

  as mentioned above this was the second time i have seen the same object do the exact same thing in nearly the same place, first sighting was slightly farther s. e. and farther away, this time it was close!!!!


 i have the event recorded, you are welcome to see, please! contact me

i sure would like to know what the hell this is!!!!
content.summary: Orange/yellow/red glowing sphere traveled n. short dist turned e., traveled short dist, stopped, dropped something

content.detailedDescription:
I*n the mid to late 50s i was an airborne radar tech flying on an rc-121
warning star aircraft on station 2 just south of sable island, nova scotia.The aps 20 radar picked up a return at approx 120 to 150 miles tothe nw. this return was traveling east at approx 2500 to 3000 miles an hour.
 we had it on the scopefor several minutes then it went off the scope and we never seen it again. we had called it in to our reporting center and requested an id on it. a half hour later we got a message back and all they would tell us was " canadian navy classified".  we all thought at the time that this was a cover story for something really strange going on. we had know visual except for the radar return and the other traffic we picked up that night appeared normal. this is the best as i can remember as it was almost 50 years ago.  i don,t know if this is revelant any more but thought iwould send it on for your info.  thank you.   jon h richardson
content.summary: Radar return

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in the passanger side of the car driving on a very busy road and i see in the trees a row of lights to the left of the car.  when we came to a clearing in the trees, there was a huge black triangle with bright white lights at each point of the triangle with one red blinking light in the middle just hovering above this house making no noise at all.  we stopped the car and opened the windows to see if we could hear anything and we heard nothing and we thought that was very weird because the mere size of this craft being as huge as it was should have been making some type of noise and it didn't move but we took off out of fear. it was one of the scariest moments of my life because i felt whatever was in the craft was watching us just like we were watching them.
content.summary: Saw a craft hovering over a house right at treetop level.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in lincoln park, michigan, driving to my sisters
 what made me notice the object, was its brightness
a ufo
 three glowing red hot orbs ascending to the sky, dripping what looked like molten slag,or molten metal dripping from it
 i lost sight when it left earths atmosphere
content.summary: Glowing orbs dripping molten slag

content.detailedDescription:
We were leaving for work just after 7 am and off to the sw i saw five very bright light forming a arch. where we live there are muck fields to the south. there are no houses or buildings. these lights were seemed to be like very bright vapor lights. at first i thought the were stars, but they were so close. as we drove down the road the just vanished. didn't really knew what we saw untill we (my wife and i)were down the road a ways. nothing else could have made these lights.    


                     *
                                   *


             *      
                                        *
                                      
        *
content.summary: Five bright lights that formed a arch. they were close to the ground. first spotted in car then they were gone. didn't see them leave just gone.
